title: Mykola Zhovtyuk
text:
Mykola Zhovtyuk (; born 21 May 1992, in <a href="Novohrad-Volynskyi">Novohrad-Volynskyi</a>, <a href="Zhytomyr%20Oblast">Zhytomyr Oblast</a>, <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28association%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who currently plays for <a href="FC%20Bukovyna%20Chernivtsi">FC Bukovyna Chernivtsi</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Second%20League">Ukrainian Second League</a>.
Zhovtyuk is the product of the UFK Lviv School System. He made his debut for FC Karpaty entering as a second-half substitute against <a href="FC%20Shakhtar%20Donetsk">FC Shakhtar Donetsk</a> on 26 August 2012 in <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
He also played for Ukrainian under-17 national football team and was called up for other age level representations.
